name: Corruption Cascade
description:
If you want to play fullscreen, select it while the game is loading! Toggling fullscreen after loading will break the controls.

A short, dodge-the-asteroids type space race where you make your way towards an anomaly that is attracting a planet-killing corruption, while avoiding getting caught in the corruption yourself.

Controls: WASD or ARROW KEYS to move, ESC to pause, SPACE to advance dialogue. You can land on a planet to fully replenish your fuel.

Made in collaboration with Obnivelint for Godot Wild Jam #46, to fit the theme "orb." Also, this is our very first full game! There are so many things we want to add/fix/do but weren't able to within the time constraints of the jam. We may end up releasing a more polished version in the future!

Known bugs: Settings page not implemented, vertical level looping is not quite seamless so sometimes planets will just appear/disappear out of nowhere, if you restart you have to hit ESC again before you can move. Sorry :/
